org.wonderly.jini2.config
Interface ConfigurationStoreProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileStoreProvider
public interface ConfigurationStoreProvider

This interface is implemented by classes that provide a mechanism for persisting ConfigurationSet instances.

Method Summary
 ConfigurationSet deleteConfigurationSet(ConfigurableId id)
          Remove the indicated configuration set from the store, and return it.
 List<ConfigurableId> getConfigurationSetKeys()
          Get the List of ConfigurableId instances that represent the ConfigurationSets that are stored
 int getCount()
          Get the count of ConfigurationSet entries that are stored
 ConfigurationSet retrieveConfigurationSet(ConfigurableId id)
          Retrieve the indicated ConfigurationSet
 void storeConfigurationSet(ConfigurationSet conf)
          Store a ConfigurationSet
